name: Around The Clock
description:
Made in 3 days for the Week 206 Weekly Game Jam (because I joined late)

Theme: Clockwork

The clock has broken and now Little One has to avoid the falling gears and the hands of the clock like CLOCKWORK. The hands of the clock are slowly getting faster so you must try to jump over them and see how long you can last not getting hit!

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys to move

Space to Jump
